Location: Thyssen Henschel in Kassel, West Germany
Comments: By Thyssen Henschel. World's first passenger-carrying, longstator vehicle. 100 m guideway.

Location: International Transportation Exhibition (IVA 79) in Hamburg. Reassembled in Kassel in 1980.

Present location: A part is in Deutsches Museum, Bonn
Comments: Presented to public in Munich on 13 March 1983. 31.5 km track.

Present location: Munich International Airport and Infozentrum Lathen (TVE Emsland)
Comments: Presented to public at the International Transportation Exhibition (IVA 88) in Hamburg.
